ygData.subject: Re: novice questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... own advantages and disadvantages.  There might be a best race for YOU, but there is no best race OVERALL for clerics.  It all depends on your playing
ygData.messageBody:
> Uhm.. I'd like to point out there is NO best cleric. Each race has its
own advantages and disadvantages. There might be a best race for YOU,
but there is no best race OVERALL for clerics. It all depends on your
playing style. <

I agree with that. I currently play a female dwarf cleric with 100 str and 105 wis base. I am wearing three items that add my wis to total 112. I find playing this character quite enjoyable since i can both do good spellcasting and good melee (and wear good armor hehe). For a cleric, that is. IMHO playing a cleric that is concentrated on spellcasting will be something completely different. I haven't played any other races for that class but i plan to do it someday. Also some of the special skills of other races (like hide with halflings) add some extra variation.

My current character that i am concentrated on:
Iyenya Goldenheart
Dwarf cleric
Sons of Serilis Officer
Innoruuk server
